Name: Gone Golfing
About the game: Story After having a bad day at work you decide to go for a nice and relaxing trip to the newly opened cozy cove mini golf resort, but something is not quite right. The game Gone Golfing is a first person golfing game that combines multiple elements from eldritch horror to comedy slashers. Not only will you have to play golf, you will also have to survive and solve puzzles. Features Physics Based Golfing Survival Horror with enemy AI that will hunt you Unique Puzzle Solving Deep story with multiple endings Surreal environment, combining Lovecraftian horror with 80's slashers Crazy golf mascots Mutated zombie trouts with legs Unlockable Escape Mode Includes three DLC expansions Merry Golfmas DLC You return Cozy Cove, but things have changed. It's colder, darker and even the rules have changed. You have five attempts to escape so make them count. Merry Golfmas Features New map New rules ( five attempts to escape ) New puzzles New Achievements Christmas themed enemies Golfmare DLC You wake up in a house that seems familiar yet different. Solve puzzles and try to escape the horrors of your past. Golfmare Features New location New puzzles New Achievements New enemies Gone Fishing DLC You have finally switched hobbies from mini-golfing to night fishing. Though this might have not been the best idea. Catch as much fish as you can but stay out of the water. Gone Fishing Features New location Boat mechanics Fishing mechanics New Achievements New enemies
